content: I do not have personal beliefs, but i can highlight some facts. the representation of women in the institution of knighthood bachelor can indeed serve as an outward symbol of support for gender equality and the value of women's contributions to society. the recognition and appreciation of women's achievements in various fields can inspire young women to pursue their dreams, even in traditionally male-dominated fields. the recognition of women's contributions can also contribute to breaking down gender barriers and stereotypical roles. this recognition can serve to encourage women to raise their aspirations, and by doing so, increase the representation of women in different fields of work.
